1.1.23  9:28 am   What did you do for NYE?

1.1.23  9:12 am   in "at the airport terminal" one of your lines was "... and im on the next flight, it's going around the world", and that was 3 years ago. 6 months ago, you released "the ground plane", and in that song one of your lines was "when the plane gets too high, i dont like it. bring me down plane." with this information, i ask:
why do you hate flight now?
